analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xe5a219d4db92a701e79b6e548803c8ce55138686.sol:
	Contract I_minter has payable functions:
	 - NewStatic (/unique_chucks/29/0xe5a219d4db92a701e79b6e548803c8ce55138686.sol#454-455)
	 - NewStaticAdr (/unique_chucks/29/0xe5a219d4db92a701e79b6e548803c8ce55138686.sol#455-456)
	 - NewRisk (/unique_chucks/29/0xe5a219d4db92a701e79b6e548803c8ce55138686.sol)
	 - NewRiskAdr (/unique_chucks/29/0xe5a219d4db92a701e79b6e548803c8ce55138686.sol)
	 - RetRisk (/unique_chucks/29/0xe5a219d4db92a701e79b6e548803c8ce55138686.sol)
	 - RetStatic (/unique_chucks/29/0xe5a219d4db92a701e79b6e548803c8ce55138686.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

RiskCoin.fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xe5a219d4db92a701e79b6e548803c8ce55138686.sol#371-374) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mint.NewRiskAdr.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/29/0xe5a219d4db92a701e79b6e548803c8ce55138686.sol#373-374)
